page.shortlink: api client api a5 controlbar focus method

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of the item to give focus to.

page.description: Programmatically focus on an item in the control bar. In the case of an edit item, the item will be put into edit mode.
page.example: // assume cbObj is a pointer to an instance of A5.ControlBar cbObj.focus('search'); // focus on the control bar edit item with the name of "search"
